content: I am not surprised seeing the news of a section of the supreme court of Nigeria being destroyed by fire. As a Nigeria that understand the mafia system controling our supposed democracy, I long expected the Election Petition Tribunal archives to be burnt since. As that didn't happen, it is obvious they waited for the materials to be move to the supreme court before they do what they know how to do best. I don't need a prophet to tell me what was burnt at the Supreme Court... we all know what it will be.This in what they really meant by "go to court" . Burning evidence in court is nothing new. In 2020, the oldest court in Lagos was burnt down.This court was said to have exhibit of cases involving high profile individuals including those that discovered and build Lagos. Is this really how democracy work? Is this how we will make Nigeria great and prosperous? I weep for my country!
